name: Not Alone!!
description:
This is my game submission for the brackeys game jam 2022.2

Sadly i couldnt finish on time. The arrows the main part of the game still are not there and so the game is unfinished.

Im stll happy i did this challenge and made it thus far in only a week. this is my fastest time creating a game from scratch.

Worst part i had exams during the week best part i enjoyed. i will finish the game after the jam but i still hope yu play and do give me any feedback or tips for improvemet thank you
